title: I just had the weirdest Yi game ever
body:
The new Poro ARAM game, each time I would Q into the enemy he would stop attacking, like, every single time.

I sat there against Monkey and Sun woman, Q into Monkey and nothing, clicking away like a teenager on heat and I just sat there doing nothing. Monkey had some 400 health and I had 100% crit with some 350 damage, yet I just wouldn't hit him.

And yes, I know what Leona can do, she wasn't doing that to me every single time I used Q.

replies.body: wot did i just read. lyk srsly

I had a really weird thing happen to me while playing Yi, i actually lost.

weird right? Must have been a bug.
I don't care about the lose, or the Wukong who was doing more damage with a tanky build, but when you go 1v1 against an AD Shaco who has 400 health and can't attack him, there is something wrong.
um, i'm thinking you are mistaken, there is no such thing as a leona and yi silly person. Its sun woman and sword guy.
